title: I don't have a HUD
body: having a lot of fun, I'm glad I lose LP because of this and am probably going to be reported 9x

replies.body:
Your settings might be corrupted and failing to load hud assets.  Resetting your config should fix this, but be sure to test it in a custom.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

From your client, go to the top right corner and go to your options. In the "In-Game" setting, there is a Hotkeys options. Scroll down and click the DISPLAY dropdown menu. There is a Show/Hide HUD option that you can assign a key to.
Yeah, I know this. It isn't a help when I haven't touched that key binding option ever and me HUD disappears. Cheers for tryin to help though.
I've tried every key combination, and I can't even close League of Legends. Very nice.

I couldn't do anything, on the occasion I could use an ability or two, otherwise no chat, no shop, no settings. I got an AFK timer for the game, really happy with that one. I think I am done with League.
